adHeader: --- Solo Party, Wedding, Event Pianist (and Singer) ---
adDetails: Fantastic San Francisco-based solo pianist (and singer) with years of experience providing live music for private parties, weddings and corporate events throughout the Bay Area (and beyond) supplies the perfect mellow or high-energy background ambience or forefront entertainment for dining, dancing, cocktailing or singing along. Fun, flexible, warm, reliable, versatile and highly professional. Classics to Top 40 and just about everything and anything in between. Affordable hourly fee includes everything but the piano (sorry, you'll need to provide that). Advance special song or music requests are always welcome and your playlist will be custom-tailored to match your needs. And there are no regularly scheduled hourly breaks ever. Here are some sample videos: Music video filmed at Max's Opera Cafe: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wHat4b17o34 Performance video filmed at Martuni's: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lFtML5ypUL0 Casual home video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MvOVWoCHE7Y Dynamic jazz trio also available: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=anZFWwn9I44 Current resume: http://sfbay.craigslist.org/sfc/res/4461608933.html Please get in touch for more information. Thanks!
